description.en: Simplify managing your banking tasks with Bank Management. On the one hand, you can take out or repay a loan in accordance with the gameplay, as well as adjust the loan interest rate or the equity ratio. It is also possible to adjust the account balance and the current credit amount directly and thus advance your game progress directly.
